metadata.Title: CVE-2018-12398 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
By using the reflected URL in some special resource URIs, such as chrome:, it is possible to inject stylesheets and bypass Content Security Policy (CSP). This vulnerability affects Firefox < 63.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-12398` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 63.0+build1-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

notes.Note: tyhicks> mozjs contains a copy of the SpiderMonkey JavaScript engine

criterions.comment: firefox package in kinetic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '63.0+build1-0ubuntu1').
